Train SOM

ok.som.function.Rd

Train SOM

ok.som.function(
  ok.traindat,
  input_trainSeed,
  input_kohInit,
  input_kohDimy,
  input_kohDimx,
  input_kohTopo,
  input_trainRlen,
  input_trainAlpha1,
  input_trainAlpha2,
  input_trainRadius1,
  input_trainRadius2
)

Arguments

ok.traindat

return object from ok.traindat.function
input_trainSeed

random seed
input_kohInit

"pca" for PCA initialization
input_kohDimy

integer indicating y dimension of SOM
input_kohDimx

integer indicating x dimension of SOM
input_kohTopo

"hexagonal" or "recantgular" for geometrical structure of SOM
input_trainRlen

integer. 100?
input_trainAlpha1

integer/double
input_trainAlpha2

integer/double
input_trainRadius1

integer/double
input_trainRadius2

integer/double

Value

res object

Examples

ok.som.function(ok.traindat = ok.traindat, input_trainSeed = 61929, 
                          input_KohInit = "pca", input_kohDimy= 10, input_kohDimx = 10,
                          input_kohTopo = "hexagonal", input_trainRlen = 100,
                          input_trainAlpha1 = 0.05, input_trainAlpha2 = 0.01, 
                          input_trainRadius1 = 6.08, input_trainRadius2 = -6.08,)

#> Error in ok.som.function(ok.traindat = ok.traindat, input_trainSeed = 61929,     input_KohInit = "pca", input_kohDimy = 10, input_kohDimx = 10,     input_kohTopo = "hexagonal", input_trainRlen = 100, input_trainAlpha1 = 0.05,     input_trainAlpha2 = 0.01, input_trainRadius1 = 6.08, input_trainRadius2 = -6.08,     ): could not find function "ok.som.function"
